question: When did Bath, England become a UNESCO World Heritage Site?
asked_question_translated: Kada Batas, Anglija, tapo UNESCO pasaulio paveldo objektu?
answer: Bato miestas (Bath) Anglijoje tapo UNESCO pasaulio paveldo objektu 1987 metais.
answer_translated_eng: Bath, England, became a UNESCO World Heritage Site in 1987.
